record.title: Announcement by the Speaker Pro Tempore
record.narrative:
Announcement by the Speaker Pro Tempore -- (House of Representatives - May 21, 2008)

[Page: H4347]
record.chair: Two minutes remain in this vote.
So the resolution was agreed to.
The result of the vote was announced as above recorded.
A motion to reconsider was laid on the table.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 339, I was attending the graduation ceremony at the United States Coast Guard Academy. Had I been present, I would have voted "nay."
